snippet: Vail International Dance Festival commissions works, and Monday’s program in Colorado featured world premieres by Brian Brooks, Matthew Neenan, Doug Varone and Christopher Wheeldon.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews world premieres of dance pieces by choreographers Brian Brooks, Matthew Neenan, Doug Varone and Christopher Wheeldon at the Vail International Dance Festival.
lead_paragraph: Vail International Dance Festival commissions works, and Monday’s program in Colorado featured world premieres by Brian Brooks, Matthew Neenan, Doug Varone and Christopher Wheeldon.

headline.seo: Vail International Dance Festival Presents 4 Premieres
headline.main: Gulping the Heady, Thin Air of Creativity
headline.print_headline: Gulping the Heady, Thin Air of Creativity
